backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a Bitcoin credit transfer system with balances, transactions, user profiles, withdrawal/transfer requests, BTC price tracking, reserve management, access control, and blockchain API integration for mainnet Segwit transactions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy type definitions for data structures including admin config, peer transfers, send BTC requests, transaction statuses, user profiles, withdrawals, and credit adjustments to support schema evolution.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting frontend transaction status tracking implementation for mainnet Segwit transactions, listing 11 affected files across UI components, hooks, and utilities with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files describing transaction status tracking UI components, hooks with polling intervals, admin pages, and styling for mainnet Segwit transaction states (signing/broadcasting/confirmation).
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark modes including transaction status colors (pending/signing/broadcast/confirmed/failed) and Segwit address styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Bitcoin Credit Transfer application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup, authentication guards (AuthenticatedRoute/AdminRoute), profile setup modal, and routes for SendBtc, History, AiLottery, and TransferTroubleshooting pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Full-screen component displaying an access denied message for non-admin users, showing their principal ID with copy functionality, session diagnostics, and action buttons for retry, sign out, or returning home.
Loading screen component shown during admin access verification, displaying a spinner, elapsed time counter, and recovery actions (retry/sign out) after 10 seconds if verification takes too long.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Card component that appears for authenticated non-admin users, displaying their principal ID with copy functionality and a retry button to re-check admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoggedOutSi: Full-screen panel with a centered sign-in button for unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Reusable authentication button that toggles between sign in and sign out states, clearing query cache and admin status on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile setup, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/balance/UsdEstim: Component that displays the estimated USD value of a BTC amount based on current price, with loading states and disclaimers about value fluctuation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Application header component containing the app title and login/logout button with authentication state handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper component that includes header, admin troubleshooting card, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/reserve/AdminBro: Collapsible card component providing guidance on Bitcoin transaction broadcasting issues, including information about HTTP outcalls and embedding best practices section.
frontend/src/components/reserve/AdminRes: Component file appears to be empty or truncated in the provided content.
frontend/src/components/reserve/BitcoinC: A collapsible card component that displays a Python code snippet for querying Bitcoin Core node balance via RPC, with warnings that this must be executed externally and cannot run within the IC canister or web app.
frontend/src/components/reserve/External: A collapsible card component showing a Python script for monitoring mining pool earnings and automating reserve transfers, with alerts emphasizing external execution requirements and security warnings about API keys.
frontend/src/components/reserve/ReserveM: A configuration panel for viewing and updating multisig reserve settings (threshold, public keys, address, redeem script) with a note that backend implementation is not yet complete.

A collapsible card displaying Python code for creating Bitcoin multisig addresses using Bitcoin Core, with warnings that execution must happen externally and results should be saved in the configuration panel.
frontend/src/components/transfers/bestPr: Defines a TypeScript interface and array of best practice entries for troubleshooting blockchain transfer issues, covering connectivity, provider timeouts, mempool congestion, and network configuration problems.
frontend/src/components/transfers/BestPr: A searchable and filterable troubleshooting guide component that auto-suggests relevant topics based on transfer failure patterns, displaying best practices entries with collapsible content organized by category.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Broadc: A collapsible alert component that displays developer documentation about how Bitcoin transaction broadcasting works, including security warnings about private keys and explanations of the app-managed custodial reserve model using IC HTTP outcalls.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Mainne: An alert component that displays important information about mainnet Bitcoin transactions, including warnings about irreversibility, reserve-funded fees, confirmation times, and Segwit support.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Provid: A placeholder card component for displaying blockchain provider diagnostics, currently showing a stub message indicating that diagnostic information will be available once the backend implements actual HTTP outcalls to blockchain APIs.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Segwit: A card component that displays detailed information about a Segwit Bitcoin transaction, including destination address, amount, estimated fee, address type badge, and transaction hash with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transa: A card component that displays a progress bar for Bitcoin transaction confirmations, showing current confirmation count out of target (default 6), estimated time remaining, and a link to view the transaction on Blockstream.

A badge component that displays the current status of a Bitcoin transaction based on signing status, broadcast status, and confirmation count, with appropriate icons and colors for each state (pending, signed, broadcasting, confirmed, failed).
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: A table component that displays transaction history with expandable rows, showing transaction ID, type, status, amount, and timestamp, with special handling for mainnet transactions that include additional details like confirmation progress and Segwit information.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: File content is truncated, but appears to be a dialog component for verifying transfer details before submission.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Admi: Empty file for admin withdrawal requests table component.
Empty file for admin withdrawal status dashboard component.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Exte: Collapsible developer reference component displaying code examples for PayPal OAuth/Payouts and Stripe payout integrations with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/With: Empty file for withdrawal history list component.
Empty file for withdrawal status summary card component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with admin tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useAiReserveMonitorin: Custom hook that manages AI reserve monitoring preference in localStorage, returning a boolean state and setter with a default value of true.
frontend/src/hooks/useFundedWithdrawalNo: Empty file for funded withdrawal notifications hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching user profiles, transaction history, transaction status, and admin privileges, with automatic polling for pending transactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm charcoal/amber color scheme for light and dark modes, including transaction status colors and financial UI component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
Empty file for admin credentials page component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Empty file for admin page component.
frontend/src/pages/AiLotteryPage.tsx: React component for generating AI-powered lottery number predictions with fallback to local data when external lottery API is unavailable. Displays multiple outcome predictions with confidence scores and handles data fetch errors gracefully.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a page to purchase credits.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the main dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays transaction history with summary statistics (total transactions, credits received/spent) and mainnet transfer status tracking. Uses TransferHistoryTable component and supports auto-opening specific transfer requests from session storage.
Empty file placeholder for viewing incoming transfer requests.
Empty file placeholder for viewing outgoing transfer requests.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzleRewardsPage.tsx: Page displaying information about puzzle rewards system with an alert indicating the feature is not yet implemented in the backend.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Form page for sending Bitcoin to external addresses with mainnet transaction tracking, status monitoring, and error handling. Includes security alerts about custodial model and displays transaction confirmation progress.
frontend/src/pages/SendToPeerPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for peer-to-peer transfer functionality.
frontend/src/pages/TransferTroubleshooti: Troubleshooting guide page for mainnet Bitcoin transactions, providing detailed diagnostics for signing issues, broadcasting problems, and network delays with best practices section.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for withdrawal functionality.
frontend/src/types/mainnet.ts: TypeScript type definitions for mainnet Bitcoin transactions including signing/broadcast status enums, extended transaction interface with mainnet fields, and result types for sendBTC and confirmation analysis operations.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: Utility for caching admin verification status per principal in localStorage with 5-minute TTL and in-memory session tracking to ensure fresh checks on new page loads.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes Bitcoin transaction errors into user-friendly messages, handling blockchain API rejections, network failures, rate limits, invalid addresses, insufficient balances, and mempool issues.
frontend/src/utils/fundedNotificationSto: Per-principal localStorage-backed store that tracks which withdrawal request IDs have been notified as PAID to prevent duplicate notifications across sessions.
frontend/src/utils/transactionStatus.ts: Utility functions for determining transaction status (pending/confirmed), formatting status messages, validating Segwit addresses, calculating confirmation times, and formatting Bitcoin amounts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage support for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, typography and container query plugins, custom animations, and financial-themed design tokens.
project_state.json: Project state tracking Bitcoin wallet application development with pending feature requests for mainnet transaction signing, blockchain posting, and Segwit wallet support with reserve-funded fees.
